name: FirePeahat (Autoghost)
author: Mero
info: I heard you liked Peahats, so I made a peahat so you can peahat while you peahat.
description: This is a peahat that drops a firetrail every 16 pixels of movement.
setup: Create a peahat, be sure to set weapon damage.Misc Attribute 11: GH_INVISIBLE_COMBOMisc Attribute 12: FirePeahat Script Slot Number
